data.title: Tesla Bear Expects EV Giant's Earnings To Fall Below Bullish Estimates In 2025, Notes Majority Of Company's Revenues Come From Car Deliveries
data.description: Tesla bear Gordon Johnson slammed bulls for their high price targets based on the assumption that the company is "more than a car company."

data.title: Mark Zuckerberg Once Told Sam Altman That The Most Painful Moment In His Life Was Not Rejecting A $1 Billion Buyout Offer For Facebook But Losing An Entire Team â€” Here's Why (CORRECTED)
data.description: Mark Zuckerberg revealed to Sam Altman that the most painful moment in Facebook's early days wasn't rejecting a billion-dollar offer, but watching his entire management team quit because they didn't believe in his vision for the company's future.

data.title: ChatGPT-Maker OpenAI's Future Hangs In The Balance As Judge Says Elon Musk's Lawsuit Will Partially Go To Trial
data.description: A federal judge ruled that parts of Elon Musk's lawsuit against OpenAI will proceed to trial, with Musk required to testify, as he seeks to block the AI company's transition to a for-profit model, which he argues contradicts its original mission.

data.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Drops As Trump's 'Crypto Czar' Announces Oversight Committee: Eric Trump Says 'Great Time' To Add ETH
data.description: Major cryptocurrencies declined sharply on Tuesday following the announcement of a new regulatory oversight committee, with total market liquidations reaching nearly $485 million in the past 24 hours.

data.title: 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli Defends Palantir's Valuation Amid 24% Surge, Says AI Firm's Cash Flow Justifies 'Expensive' Price
data.description: Martin Shkreli, the former hedge fund manager known as "Pharma Bro," defended Palantir Technologies Inc.'s valuation on Tuesday amid the company's surging stock price, projecting substantial cash flow growth for the data analytics firm through 2025.
